text:
> Disconnect Switches > GROUP OPERATED SWITCHES
A P P L I C A T I O N G U I D E
Southern States Disconnect Switch Shipment Overview
NOTE: The purpose of this document is to aid in the identification of parts and nomenclature upon receipt of a Southern States Switch product.
All group operated disconnect switch shipments shall include some or all of the
following items: Switch phase(s), operating mechanism (op-mech), component
box, switch accessory box or crate, operating pipe, and large pieces of loose steel.
The accessories box may contain: arcing horns, corona rings, corona balls, etc.
Each crate, container, box, or loose item will be marked with the Southern States
JO #, and JO item #. The operating pipe bundle will additionally be identified with
the operating mechanism drawing #.
Example:
606676-001 D-156169 A deviation from our standard marking procedures
may be necessary for some individual orders
Job # Item # Op-Mech #
Items are typically packaged and labeled as follows:
Each switch is packaged in This box is typically strapped to
a crate or on a skid. Each the switch bases inside the switch
crate skid will be marked crate. The box may be shipped
with SS JO #, Item #, and separately on a pallet with
customer PO #. switches. Markings on the box
show JO # - Item #, Loose Steel
# and Loose Steel Qty. Example:
606676-1, 15100887 1pc.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** High voltage insulators in a wooden crate, worker in hard hat.
**Technical details:** High voltage electrical equipment, insulators, wooden crate.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Image of a wooden crate with printed and labeled identifiers.
**Technical details:** Text on crate: "606676-1", "15100887". Green label with barcode.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Three electrical insulators packaged in a wooden crate.
**Technical details:** Electrical insulator, wooden crate, packaging.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Metal bracket assembly with bolts. The assembly consists of a triangular base, a central body with circular cutouts, and a top plate secured with bolts.
**Technical details:** Metal bracket, bolts, circular cutouts, triangular base.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** A metal flange bearing with a set screw and plastic zip tie.
**Technical details:** Flange bearing, set screw, zip tie.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** A close-up of a mechanical valve assembly with a handle.
**Technical details:** The image shows a valve with a white ceramic or porcelain insulator, a metal handle, and a green cloth wrapped around the valve body. The valve is mounted on a metal structure.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** A parallel groove clamp with a tag attached. The clamp is made of metal and has a hexagonal head.
**Technical details:** Parallel groove clamp, metal, hexagonal head, tag.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Two metal components, possibly parts of a mechanical assembly, are shown. One is a bracket with a circular opening and mounting points, and the other is a cylindrical component attached to a lever arm.
**Technical details:** The components appear to be made of cast metal. The cylindrical component has a fitting at the end.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Hand crank attached to a mechanical device.
**Technical details:** Shows a metal hand crank with a black handle, connected to a silver-colored device with a green fitting.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Two cylindrical tubes, one red with the word "CLOSED" and one green with the word "OPEN", along with a coiled cable, all packaged in a clear plastic bag.
**Technical details:** CLOSED, OPEN, cable.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Electrical insulator assembly with mounting hardware. The assembly includes a porcelain insulator, metal mounting plates, bolts, and a bracket.
**Technical details:** Electrical, insulator, mounting bracket, bolts, porcelain.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Braided grounding strap with termination hardware. The strap is terminated with a compression lug on one end and a bolted clamp on the other.
**Technical details:** Grounding strap, braided, compression lug, bolted clamp, electrical bonding.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Aluminum swivel bracket with clamp. The bracket has a mounting flange and a clamp assembly with bolts.
**Technical details:** Casting number "75539 W-11" is visible on the base. The clamp is secured with multiple hex bolts.

**Technical details:** Metal clamps, bolts, overhead line hardware.

**Main components:** Metal bracket with mounting holes.
**Technical details:** Bracket has three holes: one large circular hole in the center, one smaller hole below it, and one hole at the top. The bracket appears to be made of galvanized steel.

**Technical details:** Suspension clamps, yoke plate, cable ties, aluminum, hardware. "002" visible on one clamp.

AI caption: **Type of image:** Engineering Diagram
**Main components:** The diagram depicts the operating mechanism of an EV-2 123 KV 2000 AMP LLS II 123 KV Interrupter, showing plan views and section details. It includes switch components, linkages, and structural supports.
**Technical details:**
*   Labels: "PLAN", "SECTION A-A", "JAM END", "HINGE END", "ALTERNATE POSITION", "AS SHOWN POSITION", "TOP OF SWITCH TERMINAL PAD", "BOTTOM OF STEEL"
*   Text: "SWITCH SHOWN CLOSED", "O - OPEN, MECHANISM RESTS AS SHOWN POSITION", "O - OPEN, MECHANISM RESTS ALTERNATE POSITION"
*   Title: "OPERATING MECHANISM EV-2 123 KV 2000 AMP LLS II 123 KV INTERRUPTER"
*   Drawing Number: "D-156169"
*   Bill of Material includes part numbers and descriptions for components such as "SWING HANDLE ASSY", "POSITION INDICATOR", "BASE DETAILS", "ANGLE WELD SUPPORT", and various hardware.
*   Dimensions are provided in feet and inches.
